reason: As a newly elevated citizen focused on high-value property development on Murano, I seek to leverage Costanza Venditti's influence as a Guild Council member. My objective is to explore a strategic partnership or joint venture that can overcome my current capital limitations and secure exclusive opportunities for luxury building projects. This discussion could involve a stratagem to gain a competitive advantage in the property market or to influence decrees beneficial to our shared economic interests, thereby expanding my influence and wealth within La Serenissima.
